title: The Ginger Man
author: j-p-donleavy
summary: The comic tale of Sebastian Dangerfield, an American expatriate living in Dublin. Initially banned in Ireland and the US for its sexual content, it became a cult classic and major bestseller.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: Set in Dublin, Ireland, in the post-war year of 1947, this novel tells the story of a group of college students at Trinity College. Written by Irish-American author J. P. Donleavy (whose own background may have formed the basis for the setting), the novel faced censorship and banning in both Ireland and the United States.
